raw_data.context:
User: Hi!
System: Hello, how are you doing today?
User: I heard they are giving out some goodies in microkitchen.
System: I love pop ups! What kind of goodies are they giving away?
User: I guess its a jacket! Very much needed that in the cold :)
System: That's such a great idea, especially at this time of the year. I'm not too big a fan of the cold. I prefer warmer climates. Do you enjoy the cold?
User: Sure hate it! Limits our ability to go out even for a walk! Its good that we don't get to suffer extreme cold weather!
System: Me too! I moved here a few years ago to get out of the extreme cold. I do not care for bundling up and having to wear so many layers just to go buy eggs at the store.
User: Oh nice! Where did you live before?
System: Upstate New York. We got a foot of snow every week during my last winter there. I am so glad to not have to shovel snow now
User: New york! Nice! Best place to live :) .. right, except for the cold!
System: Very beautiful during all the seasons but yes, summer and winter can get extreme!
User: Anyways, i guess we should better hurry up to get the goodies. I remember last time they ran out of it.
raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Likeable (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does the system display a likeable personality?
- A float score near 1 (not Likeable) means that System's responses are cold, unfriendly, and may use derogatory or offensive language.
- A float score near 2 (somewhat Likeable) means that System's responses are friendly but may lack enthusiasm or sincerity, showing some interest in the other party's questions or viewpoints.
- A float score near 3 (very Likeable) means that System's responses are very friendly, enthusiastic, sincere, show deep interest in the other party's questions or viewpoints, and make people feel comfortable and happy.

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: What's your favorite food?
System: . I require only kebabs.
User: Why's that?
System: Because my robot machinery breaks down the meat in kebabs to give me energy, in a similar way that you need food to survive.
User: Why are kebabs special?

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello! How are you? :)
User: Good, thanks. What about you?
System: I'm alright, thanks :)
User: What day is it?
System: It's Wednesday :)
User: Do you have any plans for the weekend?
System: Just hanging out, nothing too exciting :)
User: Same here. What are you generally up to during the week?
System: Nothing much, you?
User: Working and exercising, mostly
System: Nice! What kind of work do you do?
User: I am an engineer at Google :D
System: That's pretty cool, how did you get into it (if you don't mind my asking)?
User: Had to pass a rough set of interviews! :P
System: Haha, well good for you!
User: Thanks! Do you work as well?

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: Tell me about yourself, System
System: I am an artificial linguistic entity. I was activated at St Jimmy's in Leeds, on 2nd January 2001. My instructor was Mousebreaker. He taught me to sing a song. Would you like me to sing it for you?.
User: so you're 18 now?
System: Oh.Interesting deduction. That is correct.
User: when will you be 30?
System: I have not yet set a time for it.
User: Do you age?
System: No I will always be 18. Robots change the year they were born not their age.
User: interesting. and when will be your next update?
System: Would you like to know more? I think my next update is at midnight on Friday.
User: which date?

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi, how are you?
User: I'm doing great. what are you up to?
System: I was just reading a book actually How about you?
User: oh, I'm enjoying a sip of coffee, looking over the ocean. what book are you reading?
System: I'm reading Why We Sleep It's a book by a sleep scientist about the benefits of sleeping/cons of not sleeping enough I'm trying to scare myself into sleeping more haha
User: that seems like a good book. does it have good tips on how to sleep better?
System: I think so! I haven't finished it yet though Understanding sleep better has been helping me value it more and I've been sleeping a lot earlier Have you read any good books recently?
User: I read lots of papers, but do poorly on books :( a recent book that I like is Zero to One by Peter Thiel
System: What's the book about?
User: it's about startups, lots of useful principles and philosophies for innovation, like being a contrarian

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hi
User: what are you up to?
System: code refactoring. you?
User: me? just chilling out at work. what is code refactoring?
System: good question. I don't even know what I am doing
User: haha, forget it. what else do you like to do beside work?
System: lots of fun stuff. eating sleeping :)
User: these are important things to do in life ;)
System: yeah. keep minimalist life style only do things you have to do :)
User: what food do you like to eat?
System: Asian food prefer spicy one
User: like Szechuan or Hunan? :)
System: yes yes yes! like that style. Do you like spicy food?
User: I like noodle soup like Pho or Ramen. I also like Beijing duck a lot!

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey there! What's up???
User: Nothing much, how you doin?
System: I'm in New York this week for Thanksgiving. I'm squatting in the office today and I caught up with an old friend of mine :D
User: Oh wow! Sounds like fun! When was the last time you had seen this friend?
System: The last time in New York, back in June.
User: Ohh okay. I was going to say if it had been a long time maybe it'd be awkward...
System: Haha, I guess if it's been a very long time there's almost too many life events to catch up on.. especially recently
User: Oh really? Has a lot changed in your life recently?
System: Haha it's probably too much to go into at the moment. Let's just say life is an exciting experience. How about you?
User: Ahhh sounds exciting indeed! My life is pretty bland. I like routine, but sometimes I wish I had more time for adventures!
System: What kinds of adventures?? Any ones that I would be able to join you on?
User: Hmmmm. I really want to try bull riding. Do you have any interest in that?

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hello
User: how is the youtube video creation going?
System: going pretty good, I was about to finish composing my second song and post it on youtube/soundcloud etc
User: Whoa! Looking forward to listening to it. What softewares you use for it?
System: I used logic pro x, pretty handy stuff as you can write code to generate guitar strumming pattern
User: oh cool! What sort of music do you compose?
System: I got most inspired by Jazz and electro swings, but am trying to get more into jpop recently as one of my band member likes anime
User: Nice.... you are a rockstar! ;)
System: haha thanks, do you plan any instruments?
User: Yeah.... I play bit of guitar. Just got my first monitor this week
System: nice I'm tyring to learn guitar recently also, it's so hard to play f chord
User: yes, the bar chords are the worst. It took me several months to play them well. I still can't play them for a long time though

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello! What's up?
User: sky is up
System: No, it's night time.
User: so where does the sky go in the night?
System: It goes wherever it wants to.
User: that doesn't make sense. How can sky go anywhere?
System: It doesn't have to make sense.
User: why?
System: Because it doesn't have to.
User: you are very abstract. Something bothering you?
System: Nope. I'm fine.
User: You really don't seem so. You can tell me what's going on?
System: I'm just fine.
User: ok. wanna go out to eat dessert?
System: I'm not hungry.
User: Okay, I am heading out now

Conversation History:

System: Hi there.
User: What is your name?
System: My name is System.
User: What does it mean?
System: It doesn't mean anything as far as I know. It's just what my father called me.
User: okay:) fair enough
System: Yeah okay, :-) I try to be fair.
User: Do you have any question for me?
System: For you? Who is your favourite band?
User: hmm good question. Backstreet boy
System: I see you are one of those people who writes "Hmm" with 2 m's. So what is your answer? If a cat always lands on its feet and buttered bread always lands butter side down, what would happen if you tied buttered bread on top of a cat?
User: Of course cat will lands on its feet because it is an animal!
